name: Welby
desc: Welby provides various service for the medical consultation. I have made Apis in golang for the different mobile app services of welby

name: SMART REQUEST
desc: SMART REQUEST is used for centrally managing order processing and billing management for the restaurants in japan

name: NOROX
desc: NOROX is a service to buy and sell norox products. i worked on the admin-side of this project to make cms

name: TABLE REQUEST
desc:
TABLE REQUEST is a bespo-tech service that allows you to instantly reserve a seat at a restaurant from LINE.
Reservations for the same day, which previously required confirmation by phone, can now be completed on LINE alone.

name: Switchbike
desc: Switchbike is a bike rental service inspired by European bike rental services. Switchbike uses high quality materials for each bicycle. Rather than buying your own bike, you can simply rent a bike for 1 month or longer.
